subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Tomas Fleischmann scored in the sixth round of a shootout to give the Washington Capitals a 5-4 comeback victory over the Florida Panthers on Wednesday night in Sunrise, Fla.
snippet: Tomas Fleischmann scored in the sixth round of a shootout to give the Washington Capitals a 5-4 comeback victory over the Florida Panthers on Wednesday night in Sunrise, Fla.
